proj1.description: - I built this when I was in my second year of college for our CPE-221 Software Design project. It can do basic inventory management functions like adding, updating, deleting, and viewing items in the inventory.

proj2.description: - I built this when I was taking Java NCIII this is my project we are ask todo a bank system that can do basic banking transactions like deposit, withdraw, transfer, view balance, authentication, and authorization.

proj3.description: - I created this project to improve my HTML, CSS, and JavaScript skills as I prepare to jump into React. It allows the user to enter how many six-sided dice to roll and then displays the results.

proj4.description: – I created this project to improve my React skills. It's a simple Todo List app where users can add, view, and delete tasks, helping me learn components, state, and event handling.

proj5.description: – I created this project to learn MERN stack. It's a Book CRUD app exploring my react and learning server's, api-routings, request, response, models, axios, testing api's using postman, and mongodb.
